net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.prevayler
Interface Command

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClearStorageCommand, SourceStorageCommand, SourceRemoveCommand
public interface Command
extends java.io.Serializable

An atomic transaction to be executed on a PrevalentSystem. Any operation which changes the observable state of a PrevalentSystem must be encapsulated as a Command.

Method Summary
 java.io.Serializable execute(PrevalentSystem system)
          Executes this command on the received system.
 

Method Detail

execute

public java.io.Serializable execute(PrevalentSystem system)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Executes this command on the received system. See org.prevayler.demos for examples. The returned object has to be Serializable in preparation for future versions of Prevayler that will provide fault-tolerance through system replicas.
Returns:
The object returned by the execution of this command. Most commands simply return null.
